snippet: Those who married during the two week-period when same-sex weddings were performed are left wondering whether their unions will be recognized by the state.
abstract: Legal struggle over Utah’s voter-approved ban on same-sex marriage has catapulted socially conservative state to center of national debate over who should be allowed to wed, and whether states have right to limit marriages to one man and one woman; couples married during two-week period when same-sex weddings were performed are left wondering whether their unions will be recognized by state.
lead_paragraph: Those who married during the two week-period when same-sex weddings were performed are left wondering whether their unions will be recognized by the state.

headline.main: Uncertainty in Utah as Appeals Process Plays Out Over Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Uncertainty in Utah as Appeals Process Plays Out Over Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
